text: Cecilia Nina Bowes-Lyon, Countess of Strathmore and Kinghorne, née Cavendish- Bentinck,GCVO (11 September 1862 – 23 June 1938) was the mother of Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother and maternal grandmother and godmother of Elizabeth II. Category:Royal Victorian Order Category:1862 births Category:1938 deaths Category:People from London
title: Cecilia Bowes-Lyon, Countess of Strathmore and Kinghorne
